TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TerminateWorkflow extends System.Activities.NativeActivity
Public NotInheritable Class TerminateWorkflow Inherits NativeActivity
public ref class TerminateWorkflow sealed : System::Activities::NativeActivity

Docs.summary: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the event in the host, and reports error information. Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Public Property Exception As InArgument(Of Exception)
public: property System::Activities::InArgument<Exception ^> ^ Exception { System::Activities::InArgument<Exception ^> ^ get(); void set(System::Activities::InArgument<Exception ^> ^ value); };
member this.Exception : System.Activities.InArgument<Exception> with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set. If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>. If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception's <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property. If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.

Docs.summary: A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set. If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>. If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception's <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property. If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
